metadata.title: Vitalgames | Slot Machine Manufacturer since 1996
metadata.description: Since 1996, Vitalgames has been a leader in the production of slot machines, VLTs, and multigame systems in Italy. Innovative gaming solutions for bars, arcades, and online platforms.

hero.title: Innovation in Gaming Since 1996
hero.description: Vitalgames has been creating high-quality slot machines, VLTs, and multigame systems for over 25 years. Our products combine cutting-edge technology with engaging gameplay to deliver exceptional gaming experiences.
hero.subDescription: Whether for bars, arcades, or online platforms, our gaming solutions are designed to maximize player engagement and operator revenue.
hero.bottomText: A Leader in Gaming Technology Since 1996

ageRestriction.title: Responsible gaming: +18!
ageRestriction.description: Gaming is first and foremost entertainment. Vitalgames is committed to ensuring that every player has a fun and conscious experience. The promotion of responsible gaming is at the core of our philosophy. Not allowed for minors under 18 years of age.

cabinet.title: Discover
cabinet.subtitle: Vitalgames
cabinet.description: Explore our selection of high-quality VLT cabinets, designed to deliver an immersive and engaging gaming experience.

technology.title: WHO WE ARE
technology.subtitle: The evolution of gaming, made in Italy
technology.description: VitalGames is synonymous with reliability in the gaming industry. With deep roots in the AWP market, we have gone through generations of players, constantly innovating while never losing our identity. We are an integral part of the evolution of gaming in Italy, a reference point for those seeking quality, experience, and a vision always projected towards the future.

winningTechnology.title: The evolution of gaming, made in Italy
winningTechnology.description: VitalGames is synonymous with reliability in the gaming industry. With deep roots in the AWP market, we have gone through generations of players, constantly innovating while never losing our identity.
winningTechnology.description2: We are an integral part of the evolution of gaming in Italy, a reference point for those seeking quality, experience, and a vision always projected towards the future.

multigames.title: OUR
multigames.subtitle: Vital games
multigames.description: Beyond simple gaming: experience Multigames by Vital Games.

descriptions.manhattan: Skyscrapers, lights and luxury: Manhattan is the elite multigame. From the waters with Shark to the western flavor of Midnight Saloon, to the refinement of Le Chef and the sparks of Cherry and Mister Diamond. The heart of the game beats here.
descriptions.champions: An arena of champions where every spin is a challenge to the podium. With winning titles such as Crazy Circus, Nugget d'Oro, Fortune, Dolphins and Luxury, this multigame combines adrenaline, charm and fun. Only true champions conquer the jackpot.
descriptions.fortune-ultralink: Where destiny lights up with a click! Fortune Ultralink is an explosion of styles and personalities: from the mystery of The Weird Family to the unbridled wealth of Billionaire, from pirates to Mexican atmospheres. Press the red button and let yourself be surprised.
descriptions.diamante: Light, fortune and legend meet in Diamante, the multigame that shines with unique adventures. From the irony of Lo Ostrich to the thrill of Vampiro, passing through the charisma of Cowboy Revenge 2 and the magic of Magic Diamond 2, each game is a treasure to be discovered.
descriptions.piggy-gold: Wealth, irony and fantasy come together in Piggy Gold. A colorful cast – from the lucky elf to the wild Mexican, from the seduction of Striptease to the strength of Dragon – makes this multigame a real show of luck.
descriptions.casino-royale: An exclusive table awaits you with a selection of elite games: live the adventure with Book of Magic, explore the seabed with Nautilus, search for gold with Pepita D'Oro, face the jungle in Jungle and enjoy the taste of fruit with Golden Fruit. The experience of a real classy casino, all in a single multigame.
descriptions.circus: Welcome to the fun tent! Circus is an eccentric and surprising multigame, populated by unusual characters: The Clown, Cat Woman, Robin Wood, Igor and the crazy fruits of Crazy Fruit. A carousel of emotions between laughter and twists.
descriptions.rubino: A precious mix of charm, mystery and twists. Rubino takes you to a brilliant universe of aliens, illusionists and chess games. Play with Striptease, Aliens, The Jester, Checkmate and The Magic Box.
descriptions.pool-4: One pool table, four characters and one rule: have fun. Pool 4 combines style, humor and jackpot challenges with iconic titles such as Pablito, Il Grillo, Julio and Lucky 8. A multigame that goes straight to the center!
descriptions.zaffiro: A glacial elegance hides the adrenaline of explosive games. Zaffiro is the multigame where fortune meets legend with titles such as The Time, The Red Baron, The Chef, Mohamed and Dragon.
descriptions.topazio: Topazio is the kingdom of out-of-the-box characters and explosive surprises. Between a secret operation and an orchard of winnings, you can choose between Topo Loco, Warrior, Cherry, Ghostplay and BIB - Bet In Black.
descriptions.golden-club-argento: A journey through history, ingenuity and adventure. Golden Club Argento is a multigame that mixes fun and culture, with games like Magic America, La Lira and Sfinge 2. There is no shortage of hilarity and lightness with Twist and wild exploration with Monkey.
descriptions.golden-club-oro: The timeless charm of the game in an explosive mix. Golden Club Oro takes you from Pablito to the seductive Hot Pepper, from the strong arm of Popeye to the dark world of Zombies and the timeless Lucky 8. Gold on reels.
descriptions.golden-club-platino: Luxury takes shape in Golden Club Platino. With fairy-tale titles like Il Grillo, Eden and Golden Slot, and legendary characters like Torero and Sonny Bono, this multigame is a concentration of elegance and twists.
descriptions.lucky-slot: A four-leaf clover brings good luck, but here every game is an amulet. Lucky Slot is the multigame that combines epic, magic and fun: Ave Cesare, Excalibur, Minotaurus, Magic Mirror and Dolphins make up an offer for truly lucky people.

manhattan.title: MANHATTAN
manhattan.description: Vital Games presents MultiGames Manhattan, a mix of 5 unique games: Shark, Midnight Saloon, Mister Diamond, Cherry and Le Chef, designed to offer complete and engaging entertainment.
manhattan.ageRestriction: Gaming is prohibited for minors under 18 years. Play responsibly

vlt.title: VLT CABINETS
vlt.description: Discover our high-quality VLT cabinets, designed to deliver a superior gaming experience in dedicated venues

items.title: Networked Gaming
items.description: All our VLTs are connected to a central system for monitoring, control, and jackpot management.

items.title: Secure Platform
items.description: Built with multiple security layers to protect both players and operators.

items.title: Premium Content
items.description: Featuring our most advanced games with exclusive features and jackpots.

items.title: Regulatory Compliance
items.description: Designed to meet all regulatory requirements across different jurisdictions.

systems.title: Our VLT Systems
systems.description: Vitalgames offers a range of VLT solutions to meet different regulatory requirements and operator needs.

items.title: Diamond VLT
items.description: Our flagship VLT system featuring premium games and advanced features.

items.title: Crystal Network
items.description: A scalable VLT solution ideal for medium to large venues.

items.title: Ruby Link
items.description: Compact VLT system perfect for smaller locations with limited space.

items.title: Real-time Monitoring
items.description: Track performance, diagnose issues, and manage your VLT network in real-time.

items.title: Flexible Configuration
items.description: Customize game selection, bet limits, and features to suit your venue.

items.title: Detailed Reporting
items.description: Access comprehensive reports on performance, player behavior, and revenue.

items.title: Remote Updates
items.description: Deploy new games and software updates remotely without disruption.

cabinets.name: VLT Classic
cabinets.description: Classic VLT cabinet with elegant design and intuitive interface, ideal for traditional gaming halls.

cabinets.name: VLT Pro
cabinets.description: Professional version with HD screen and advanced audio system for an immersive gaming experience.

cabinets.name: VLT Deluxe
cabinets.description: Luxury cabinet with premium finishes and cutting-edge technology for exclusive VLT venues.

cabinets.name: VLT Premium
cabinets.description: Premium solution with dual screen and customizable LED lighting to maximize appeal.

cabinets.name: VLT Gold
cabinets.description: Distinctive octagonal design with 4K graphics and linked jackpot system for more exciting wins.

cabinets.name: VLT Platinum
cabinets.description: Our top-of-the-line solution with triple screen, extraordinary visual effects, and ergonomic comfort.

hero.title: AWP Multigame Systems
hero.subtitle: Multiple Games, One Machine
hero.description: Our AWP multigame systems offer a variety of gaming experiences in a single cabinet, maximizing floor space and player engagement.

items.title: Game Variety
items.description: Up to 50 different games available on a single machine.

items.title: Easy Navigation
items.description: Intuitive interface allowing players to quickly find and switch between games.

items.title: Regular Updates
items.description: New games added regularly to keep content fresh and engaging.

items.title: Customization
items.description: Operators can select which games to feature based on player preferences.

systems.title: Our Multigame Systems
systems.description: Vitalgames offers several multigame platforms to suit different venue types and player preferences.

items.title: Diamond Collection
items.description: Our premium multigame system featuring our most popular titles.

items.title: Sapphire Selection
items.description: A balanced mix of classic and new games for broad appeal.

items.title: Emerald Series
items.description: Focused on innovative game mechanics and bonus features.

items.title: Space Efficiency
items.description: Offer more game variety without requiring additional floor space.

items.title: Player Retention
items.description: Keep players engaged longer with multiple gaming options.

items.title: Revenue Optimization
items.description: Track which games perform best and adjust your offering accordingly.

items.title: Future-Proof Investment
items.description: Regular updates ensure your machines always offer fresh content.

page.title: AWP MultiGames
page.subtitle: Discover our selection of multigame systems for bars and gaming halls

section.title: Discover our Games
section.description: Innovative multigame systems that offer multiple slots in a single machine, ideal for bars and gaming halls looking to maximize entertainment offerings

hero.title: Our Game Library
hero.subtitle: Diverse Gaming Experiences
hero.description: Explore our extensive collection of games, from classic fruit machines to innovative video slots with immersive bonus features.

allGames.noGames: No games found matching your criteria.

allGamesDescriptions.alieni: Strange signals from space animate Aliens, an unconventional slot where every spin can trigger intergalactic surprises. Between spaceships, mysterious symbols and cosmic twists, prepare for a journey where the unexpected is the rule.
allGamesDescriptions.book-of-magic: An ancient book, a legendary discovery. Book of Magic takes you on a journey through arcane symbols and hidden mysteries, where every spin can reveal forgotten powers and special features waiting to be discovered.
allGamesDescriptions.braccio-di-ferro: Timeless icons and challenges to the last spin. Popeye brings a legendary cast to the stage with muscles, rivalries and surprising prizes. Energy, irony and twists: this slot certainly doesn't mince words.
allGamesDescriptions.cherry: Classic symbols, fast pace and always fresh prizes. Cherry recalls the essence of the most iconic slots, with bright fruits, golden bells and the timeless charm of the 7. A great classic, ready to give satisfaction with every spin.
allGamesDescriptions.cowboy-revenge-2: The Far West does not forget. Cowboy Revenge 2 brings you back to dust, duels and revenge with spins. Among determined characters, fiery atmospheres and bonuses ready to strike, here the law is only one: that of luck.
allGamesDescriptions.crazy-circus: Welcome to the craziest tent in the world of slots. Crazy Circus mixes colors, eccentric characters and plot twists worthy of a show without rules. Here, the surprise is always behind the curtain.
allGamesDescriptions.dark-pirates: In Dark Pirates, every spin is a boarding. Sunken treasures, mysterious symbols and pirates ready for anything: climb aboard and discover what lies in the chests of destiny.
allGamesDescriptions.dolphins: A dive into lightheartedness with Dolphins, where sea creatures and colorful symbols accompany each spin in a light-hearted aquatic world, but full of surprises.
allGamesDescriptions.eden: Between forbidden apples and ancestral symbols, Eden takes you back to where it all began. A lush garden hides unpredictable bonuses and an atmosphere of primordial charm.
allGamesDescriptions.elfi: Discover the enchanted forest of Elfi, where every spin can reveal hidden gold, magical features and lucky encounters. A fairytale to play.
allGamesDescriptions.excalibur: Only the most daring can wield the legend. In Excalibur knights, regal symbols and lucky shots intertwine in an adventure with an epic flavor.
allGamesDescriptions.fortune: Elegance and intuition meet in Fortune, the slot that brings the charm of the casino to every spin. Between cards, roulette and elite symbols, fortune here dresses in a tuxedo.
allGamesDescriptions.golden-fruit: Shiny fruits and classic hall symbols blend together in Golden Fruit, a slot that combines tradition and sophistication. A vintage taste, with decidedly modern prizes.
allGamesDescriptions.golden-slot: Minimal in design, rich in potential. Golden Slot is a tribute to the essence of slot machines: clear symbols, fast pace and brilliant wins, without frills.
allGamesDescriptions.hot-pepper: Sensual and bold, Hot Pepper lights up the screen with spicy symbols and provocative atmospheres. A slot for those looking for an experience outside the box.
allGamesDescriptions.il-barone-rosso: Take flight with The Red Baron, a high-voltage slot where every spin is a mission. Between biplanes, acrobatics and fighter symbols, the sky has never been so close.
allGamesDescriptions.il-cuoco: In Il Cuoco, cooking becomes a game. Tasty ingredients, steaming symbols and starred chef prizes: each spin is a dish ready to serve… with a pinch of luck.
allGamesDescriptions.il-giullare: Between royal palaces and unscripted laughter, The Jester animates the court with irreverent symbols and unpredictable bonuses. Play with the unexpected and let it entertain you.
allGamesDescriptions.il-grillo: A little advice can change everything. The Cricket takes you through fairy worlds, brilliant bonuses and playful surprises, where magic speaks with a gentle voice.
allGamesDescriptions.julio: Lights on, spotlights on: Julio is on stage. An elegant and theatrical slot, with grand soirée symbols and features that make fortune sing.
allGamesDescriptions.jungle: Welcome to the jungle. In Jungle, charismatic animals and tribal symbols compete to the rhythm of spins. Only those with instinct will know how to conquer the rewards of the wild.
allGamesDescriptions.la-scatola-magica: Nothing is as it seems in The Magic Box. Inspired by fairy tale worlds, every spin can reveal enchanting surprises and mysterious functions. Curious to find out what's inside?
allGamesDescriptions.le-chef: A French touch, impeccable cuisine. Le Chef mixes refinement and luck in a tasty slot, where each symbol is an ingredient for big wins.
allGamesDescriptions.lo-struzzo: With The Ostrich you play with golden eggs. Friendly and unpredictable, this bird brings with it unusual bonuses and an exhilarating race towards fortune.
allGamesDescriptions.lucky-8: Precision, style and a pinch of fate. Lucky 8 immerses you in a retro arcade atmosphere, where every spin is a true champion's play.
allGamesDescriptions.dragon: A journey through bamboo and oriental legends. Dragons, amulets and ancient symbols open the doors to mystical wins and fiery strokes of luck.
allGamesDescriptions.luxury: Champagne, luxury cars and exclusive environments. Each spin is a step into the elite, where elegance and wealth shine at every turn.
allGamesDescriptions.magic-diamond-2: The Return of the Enchanted Diamond. Sparkling with magic, this new adventure reveals hidden bonuses and prizes with a precious cut.
allGamesDescriptions.mexican: An explosion of colors, tequila and Latin rhythm. Accompanied by an overwhelming host, each spin is a party full of spicy surprises.
allGamesDescriptions.midnight-saloon: Neon lights and a night-time saloon atmosphere. Between bikers, sensual beauties and desert mysteries, every ride can become a legend.
allGamesDescriptions.minotaurus: In the heart of the labyrinth, the fury of the Minotaur is unleashed. Brutal strength and mythological symbols collide for epic rewards.
allGamesDescriptions.mohamed: A legend steps into the ring. Every blow thrown amidst lights and applause can turn into a world champion's victory.
allGamesDescriptions.nautilus: A brave captain leads the exploration into the depths of the sea. Among sunken ruins and hidden treasures, the adventure has just begun.
allGamesDescriptions.pablito: A shrewd and carefree character among luxury, beaches and green leaves. Each spin is a Colombian-style twist.
allGamesDescriptions.pepita-d-oro: In the heart of the mine, precious nuggets are hidden. Follow the old gold digger and dig up rich prizes with every spin.
allGamesDescriptions.piggy-gold: Two pigs in gala attire welcome you to their golden kingdom. Luxury, irony and sparkling wins come together in this slot waiting to be discovered.
allGamesDescriptions.reggae-frog: A tropical setting, a relaxed pace and a protagonist who is truly out of the ordinary. A game with a free and irreverent spirit.
allGamesDescriptions.scacco-matto: The king and queen challenge each other between precious pawns and strategic moves. A fantasy world inspired by the noblest game ever.
allGamesDescriptions.shark: Colorful, fierce and smiling: the protagonists of this underwater adventure are sharks ready to make your eyes pop out... and your prizes.
allGamesDescriptions.sonny-bono: A boss from another era, cigar in mouth and determined look. Between smoke, soft lights and retro atmospheres, the scene is all his.
allGamesDescriptions.striptease: Red curtain, spotlights and three breathtaking protagonists. Elegance meets seduction on a stage full of surprises.
allGamesDescriptions.the-weird-family: An eccentric family, a mysterious villa and an irresistible gothic-cartoon style. Enter if you have courage... and a sense of humor.
allGamesDescriptions.the-time: An old guardian of time holds a precious secret in his hands. Each turn is a journey through gears and wonders of times gone by.
allGamesDescriptions.torero: Strength, pride and passion come together in the arena. The bullfighter faces his destiny before the eyes of an audience waiting for the perfect shot.
allGamesDescriptions.vampiro: Full moon, dark castle and creatures of the night. In this gothic kingdom, the vampire is ready to strike... and reward.
allGamesDescriptions.zombie: A city in ruins, hordes of undead and a protagonist ready for anything. In this adrenaline-filled slot, survival is worth its weight in gold.

cookieBanner.title: Cookie Policy
cookieBanner.description: This website uses cookies to improve your browsing experience, personalize content and ads, provide social media features, and analyze our traffic. We also use third-party cookies that help us analyze and understand how you use this website.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: Vitalgames has been a leader in the gaming industry since 1996, specializing in the production of slot machines, VLTs and multigame systems. Based in Milan, we serve customers throughout Europe with innovative and certified solutions.

iso.description: ISO 9001 certified quality management system ensuring excellence in every product.

experience.description: Over 25 years of experience in the gaming industry with continuous innovation.

games.description: Hundreds of games developed and distributed across Europe with proven success.

partners.description: Trusted partnerships with leading operators and distributors in the gaming sector.

philosophy.description: Our philosophy is based on continuous innovation, product quality and customer satisfaction. We invest constantly in research and development to offer cutting-edge gaming solutions.

presence.description: With a strong presence in the European market, we continue to expand our reach while maintaining our commitment to excellence and regulatory compliance in every jurisdiction we serve.

ageVerificationModal.title: Age Verification
ageVerificationModal.description: This content is intended for adults. Please confirm you meet the legal age requirement to continue.
ageVerificationModal.confirm: I confirm I am 18+ years old
